Activity: Review SEC filings related to algorithmic trading regulation.
Check emails. Address questions from @PM-1 regarding project timelines and resource allocation.
Continue prototyping the data processing pipeline. Implement error handling and logging mechanisms to ensure data quality and system stability.
Research risk management system (RMS) vendors or open-source solutions. Identify systems that can provide real-time risk monitoring, limit checking, and stress testing capabilities.
Prepare a presentation summarizing the proposed architecture for the data feeds and trading platform. Include diagrams, technology selections, and a discussion of potential risks and challenges.
Lunch Break - Discuss market trends with colleagues (informally).
Present the proposed architecture to @CIO-1, @COO-1, and key stakeholders. Answer questions and address concerns about the design.
Incorporate feedback from the presentation into the architecture document. Make any necessary revisions to the design.
Evaluate the security aspects of the chosen technologies. Identify potential vulnerabilities and implement security best practices.
End of Day - Review presentation feedback and create action items.
